meanings.definition: The belly or abdomen, especially a protruding one.
meanings.sent1: He patted his paunches after a big meal.
meanings.sent2: The man's paunches jiggled as he laughed heartily.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful swipes at his paunches made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His paunches were like two round pillows stuffed under his shirt.
meanings.sent5: The sight of his paunches made the children giggle.

meanings.definition: To have a large, protruding belly.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa paunches proudly after years of good eating.
meanings.sent2: The retired wrestler paunches from years of retirement.
meanings.sent3: The balloon slowly paunches as the air is released.
meanings.sent4: The boat paunches through the waves, creating ripples.
meanings.sent5: The tree's roots paunches out of the ground like gnarled fingers.
